column4: This is strange...I just added universe and multiverse, and I can't find octave-forge with apt-cache search...
I did that
it is there
I'm glad.  I do need it.  I wonder why I can't get it, though.
try "sudo apt-get update" again
I have done that a few times now.
i dunno what to suggest. it's definitely in the hoary universe package. perhaps someone else will confirm warty
Well, I guess I'll just dist-upgrade :)
work is being done on usplash
it hasn't been released?
no, not yet.  But it's advantage over bootsplash is that it'll run in userspace.
they've been working on it for ages haven't they?
ubuntu has only been around since about October.  I wouldn't really call that "ages" yet ;)
have you heard anything about the new drivers, whether they work and so on?
no, I haven't...
what kind of failure?
subprocess pre-removal script returned error exit status 2
on occasion, I've edited the script
good idea. lemme try that
it sounds like a bug should be filed, but it'll help you remove it in the short term
it's ok, it was my package. that's done the job, thanks
